name: Mitigation Playbook for Application Layer Protocol Exploitation
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a web application to execute commands and exfiltrate sensitive data via HTTP requests.

action--0926fb39-54d4-472d-93b8-0534fbd3.name: Block outbound traffic to known malicious IP
action--0926fb39-54d4-472d-93b8-0534fbd3.description: Block any outgoing connections to known malicious IPs identified during the investigation.

action--0c0ebdca-3365-40f6-83c6-5d0deac5.name: Kill malicious process
action--0c0ebdca-3365-40f6-83c6-5d0deac5.description: Terminate any processes related to the detected malicious activity.

action--3e2ed867-19c0-4217-8f8e-f5e2a7e1.name: Perform forensic analysis of compromised host
action--3e2ed867-19c0-4217-8f8e-f5e2a7e1.description: Conduct forensic analysis on host-101 to identify any lingering threats.

while-condition--7ac6b0b0-e966-4a66-af22.name: Repeat forensic scan until clean
while-condition--7ac6b0b0-e966-4a66-af22.description: Repeat the forensic scan until the host is clean.

action--5f0215d3-a167-4293-bb41-1635f44e.name: Update web application firewall rules
action--5f0215d3-a167-4293-bb41-1635f44e.description: Update the WAF rules to block unwanted HTTP POST requests.

action--ec6a94b2-c73c-4324-a805-196bd2fc.name: Notify security team of incident
action--ec6a94b2-c73c-4324-a805-196bd2fc.description: Alert the security team regarding the incident on host-101.

commands.command: send-email security@organization.com -subject 'Critical Incident' -body 'Incident detected at host-101.'
